title: ReflectanceProfileFile
description: This element represents a file in .csv or other suitable formats containing the Reflectance profile of this optical component.

subCategoriesOrder.ReflectanceProfileFile: This element represents a file in .csv or other suitable formats containing the Reflectance profile of this optical component.

ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this element.

Namespace.description: We recommend the inclusion of a namespace for annotations you define. If it is absent then we assume the annotation is to use our (OME's) default interpretation for this type.

Annotator.description: The Annotator is the person who attached this annotation.e.g. If UserA annotates something with TagB, owned by UserB, UserA is still the Annotator.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: This element holds a simple multi-line comment or annotation describing this component.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
